description: Discover the best hotels in Rowland Flat, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Barossa Valley Vineyard Escape with Onsite Restaurant & Spa
hotels.description: Discover the rustic charm of South Australia's wine country with a stay at the Novotel Barossa Valley Resort. Overlooking the renowned Jacob's Creek Vineyards, this tranquil retreat offers panoramic views of the Barossa Ranges, with each room boasting a private balcony. Explore the local wineries, dine at the hotel's Cellar Kitchen restaurant, indulge in some me-time at the onsite Endota Spa, or take a swing at the adjacent Tanunda Pines Golf Course. For a change of pace, take a scenic drive to the Whispering Wall, a unique acoustic marvel located within the Barossa Reservoir.
